bibl.title: Hellenistic and Roman Terracottas from Egypt. (Monumenta Antiquitatis extra fines Hungariae reperta. 4 = Bibliotheca archaeologica. 15.)
bibl.note: 326 terracottas, of which 309 are kept in the Budapest Museum of Fine Arts.
bibl.seg: TÖRÖK László, Hellenistic and Roman Terracottas from Egypt. (Monumenta Antiquitatis extra fines Hungariae reperta. 4 = Bibliotheca archaeologica. 15.)
Roma, "L'Erma" di Bretschneider, 1995, 4°, 199 pp. et 173 pll., dont 16 pll. coul. ISBN 88-7062-909-0. L. 500.000.
326 terracottas, of which 309 are kept in the Budapest Museum of Fine Arts.
C.R. par Michel Malaise, Kernos 10 (1997) pp. 368-371. - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 72 (1997) No. 144, pp. 371-376.
